reviewText:
The second part of the outrageous romantic comedy He's a Woman, She's a Man. Definitely one for the collection of guys who think they can score big ( of laughs of course! - MIND OUT OF GUTTER PEOPLE!!!! ) from the one they love.

Once again Leslie Cheung and Anita Yuen (Yuen Wing Yee) and additional chinese acting legend Anita Mui team up in this riotus romance fo what happens when the person you love moves in.

Who WOULDN'T love this movie?
